page.title: 03THE FLOODS IN CHRISTCHURCH.
page.content: In 1980 at{Iford}there were floods.This does not happen very often unless there are heavy rains the day or night before.This has only happened a few times when the{River {Stour}gets too much water in it and causes it to overflow.Lots of houses that were nearby got flooded.There was one house where there was an old lady and man asleep.They didnt wake up in time and they had to be rescued.In some cases new houses had to be built.You had to swim up the road to get out.People had to buy new beds new curtains and all new furniture including new carpets.The river is down at Iford.As I said before it does not overflow very often.
